Title: Dr. Giggles
Actors: Larry Drake, Holly Marie Combs, Cliff De Young, Glenn Quinn
Plot: The psychopathic son of a mass-murdering doctor, escapes from his mental institution to seek revenge on the town where his father was caught. The giggling doctor kills his victims with a surgical theme. His goal being to give one of the townfolk a heart transplant.
Production: Dark Horse Entertainment, Largo Entertainment, JVC Entertainment
